mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_Phone_num, user_level, user_demo )values( #{user_id}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_password}, #{user_type}, #{user_state}, #{user_create_time}, #{user_Phone_num}, #{user_level}, #{user_demo} )
mapper.update: update user set user_password = #{password} where user_Phone_num = #{phone}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_update_time, user_Phone_num, user_lastlog_time, user_level, user_demo from user where user_id = #{userId}

select u.user_nickname, u.user_password, u.user_type, u.user_state, u.user_create_time, u.user_update_time, u.user_Phone_num, u.user_lastlog_time, u.user_level, u.user_demo, t.user_info_name, t.user_info_tel, t.user_info_addr, t.user_info_email, t.user_info_company, t.user_info_updateTime, t.user_info_headimg, t.user_info_agency_name, t.user_info_agency_number from user u left join user_info t on u.user_id = t.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}

select user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_type, user_state, user_create_time, user_update_time, user_Phone_num, user_lastlog_time, user_level, user_demo from user order by user_create_time desc
